name: The Little Witch's Potion
description:
Hello guys! This is my second game. I made it for: My First Game Jam: Summer 2022. Hope you like it! And I apologize for the bugs, unfortunately I was short on time and I ended up leaving some bugs open.

This is a game about a little witch who has to make a healing potion for her mother! Look for the ingredients, mix and try to make the potion.

Credits:
Wictor Fontes - Arts and Programing
Guilherme Marques - Music (except end music)
